verses.text: Able to deliver, able to atone; Is there any power can really by? Able to de - liver! can it real - ly be? Are you trusting? Don't you see? all save the won?
Able to de - liver me from Satan's chain? Tell me, tell me tru - ly, is the Christ once slain Able to de - liver me from Satan's chain? Give me her sad ading, be - ly for the saint?

chorus.text: Able to de - liver, Able to save, When you are, my Brother, A - ble to de - liver.
